name: Nuclear Counterterrorism and Incident Response Program
objective: To assist nonprofit, non-government, professional organizations, through a financial assistance award, in improving the Nation’s emergency preparedness, response and recovery posture to radiological and nuclear events and to encourage State and local government participation in informing domestic and international policies, regulations, contingency planning, training and capacity-building.
applicant_types: Public nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)

results.description: Participated in working groups, training courses, and information management.
Participated in working groups, training courses, exercises, and information management.
Anticipated to have participation in working groups, training courses, and information management.
